verses.verse: <S%H310>After<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1697>things<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H1961>came<s%> to <S%H87>Abram<s%> in a <S%H4236>vision,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "Do not <S%H3372>fear,<s%> <S%H87>Abram,<s%> I am a <S%H4043>shield<s%> to you; Your <S%H7939>reward<s%> shall be <S%H3966>very<s%> <S%H7235>great.<s%>"

And <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> "O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H4100>what<s%> wilt Thou <S%H5414>give<s%> me, since I <S%H1980>am<s%> <S%H6185>childless,<s%> and the <S%H1121>heir<s%> <S%H4943><s%> of my <S%H1004>house<s%> is <S%H461>Eliezer<s%> of <S%H1834>Damascus<s%>?"

And <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H2005>"Since<s%> Thou hast <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H3808>no<s%> <S%H2233>offspring<s%> to me, <S%H1121>one<s%> <S%H1121>born<s%> in my <S%H1004>house<s%> is my <S%H3423>heir.<s%>"

Then <S%H2009>behold,<s%> the <S%H1697>word<s%> of the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> came to him, <S%H559>saying,<s%> <S%H2088>"This<s%> man will not be your <S%H3423>heir;<s%> but one <S%H834>who<s%> shall <S%H3318>come<s%> <S%H3318>forth<s%> from your own <S%H4578>body,<s%> he shall be your <S%H3423>heir.<s%>"

And He <S%H3318>took<s%> him <S%H2351>outside<s%> and <S%H559>said,<s%> <S%H4994>"Now<s%> <S%H5027>look<s%> toward the <S%H8064>heavens,<s%> and <S%H5608>count<s%> the <S%H3556>stars,<s%> <S%H518>if<s%> you are <S%H3201>able<s%> to <S%H5608>count<s%> them." And He <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3541>"So<s%> shall your <S%H2233>descendants<s%> be."
Then he <S%H539>believed<s%> in the <S%H3068>Lord;<s%> and He <S%H2803>reckoned<s%> it to him as <S%H6666>righteousness.<s%>

And He <S%H559>said<s%> to him, "I am the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H834>who<s%> <S%H3318>brought<s%> you out of <S%H218>Ur<s%> of the <S%H3778>Chaldeans,<s%> to <S%H5414>give<s%> you <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H776>land<s%> to <S%H3423>possess<s%> it."
And he <S%H559>said,<s%> "O <S%H136>Lord<s%> <S%H3068>God,<s%> <S%H4100>how<s%> may I <S%H3045>know<s%> that I shall <S%H3423>possess<s%> it?"

So He <S%H559>said<s%> to him, <S%H3947>"Bring<s%> Me a <S%H8027>three<s%> <S%H8027>year<s%> <S%H8027>old<s%> <S%H5697>heifer,<s%> and a <S%H8027>three<s%> <S%H8027>year<s%> <S%H8027>old<s%> <S%H5795>female<s%> <S%H5795>goat,<s%> and a <S%H8027>three<s%> <S%H8027>year<s%> <S%H8027>old<s%> <S%H352>ram,<s%> and a <S%H8449>turtledove,<s%> and a <S%H1469>young<s%> <S%H1469>pigeon.<s%>"

Then he <S%H3947>brought<s%> <S%H3605>all<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> to Him and <S%H1334>cut<s%> them in <S%H8432>two,<s%> and <S%H5414>laid<s%> <S%H376>each<s%> <S%H1335>half<s%> <S%H7122>opposite<s%> the <S%H7453>other;<s%> but he did not <S%H1334>cut<s%> the <S%H6833>birds.<s%>
And the <S%H5861>birds<s%> of <S%H5861>prey<s%> <S%H3381>came<s%> <S%H3381>down<s%> upon the <S%H6297>carcasses,<s%> and <S%H87>Abram<s%> <S%H5380>drove<s%> them <S%H5380>away.<s%>

Now when the <S%H8121>sun<s%> was <S%H935>going<s%> down, a <S%H8639>deep<s%> <S%H8639>sleep<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon <S%H87>Abram;<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> <S%H367>terror<s%> [and] <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H2825>darkness<s%> <S%H5307>fell<s%> upon him.

And [God] <S%H559>said<s%> to <S%H87>Abram,<s%> <S%H3045>"Know<s%> for <S%H3045>certain<s%> that your <S%H2233>descendants<s%> will be <S%H1616>strangers<s%> in a <S%H776>land<s%> that is not <S%H1992>theirs,<s%> where they will be <S%H5647>enslaved<s%> and <S%H6031>oppressed<s%> <S%H702>four<s%> <S%H3967>hundred<s%> <S%H8141>years.<s%>

"But I will <S%H1571>also<s%> <S%H1777>judge<s%> the <S%H1471>nation<s%> <S%H834>whom<s%> they will <S%H5647>serve;<s%> and <S%H310>afterward<s%> <S%H3651><s%> they will <S%H3318>come<s%> out with <S%H1419>many<s%> <S%H7399>possessions.<s%>
"And as for you, you shall <S%H935>go<s%> to your fathers in <S%H1>peace;<s%> you shall be <S%H7965>buried<s%> at a <S%H6912>good<s%> <S%H2896>old<s%> <S%H7872>age.<s%>

"Then in the <S%H7243>fourth<s%> <S%H1755>generation<s%> they shall <S%H7725>return<s%> <S%H2008>here,<s%> for the <S%H5771>iniquity<s%> of the <S%H567>Amorite<s%> is not <S%H5704>yet<s%> <S%H2008><s%> <S%H8003>complete.<s%>"

And it <S%H1961>came<s%> about when the <S%H8121>sun<s%> had <S%H935>set,<s%> that it was <S%H5939>very<s%> <S%H5939>dark,<s%> and <S%H2009>behold,<s%> [there appeared] a <S%H6227>smoking<s%> <S%H8574>oven<s%> and a <S%H784>flaming<s%> <S%H3940>torch<s%> <S%H834>which<s%> <S%H5674>passed<s%> <S%H996>between<s%> <S%H428>these<s%> <S%H1506>pieces.<s%>

On that <S%H3117>day<s%> the <S%H3068>Lord<s%> <S%H3772>made<s%> a <S%H1285>covenant<s%> with <S%H87>Abram,<s%> <S%H559>saying,<s%> "To your <S%H2233>descendants<s%> I have <S%H5414>given<s%> <S%H2088>this<s%> <S%H776>land,<s%> From the <S%H5104>river<s%> of <S%H4714>Egypt<s%> as <S%H5704>far<s%> as the <S%H1419>great<s%> <S%H5104>river,<s%> the <S%H5104>river<s%> Euphrates: <S%H6578><s%>
the <S%H7017>Kenite<s%> and the <S%H7074>Kenizzite<s%> and the <S%H6935>Kadmonite<s%>
and the <S%H2850>Hittite<s%> and the <S%H6522>Perizzite<s%> and the <S%H7497>Rephaim<s%>
and the <S%H567>Amorite<s%> and the <S%H3669>Canaanite<s%> and the <S%H1622>Girgashite<s%> and the <S%H2983>Jebusite.<s%> "
